repos_data.description: Make Your Company Data Driven. Connect to any data source, easily visualize, dashboard and share your data.

pandas on AWS - Easy integration with Athena, Glue, Redshift, Timestream, Neptune, OpenSearch, QuickSight, Chime, CloudWatchLogs, DynamoDB, EMR, SecretManager, PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLServer and S3 (Parquet, CSV, JSON and EXCEL).
An automation platform with a plugin architecture that allows you to easily create and share services.
